analysis.description:
MTYToken.refundTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x0b5a15b95b023317651cd1e09e5b23f31170a761.sol#365-376) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_refund,_value) (/unique_chucks/19/0x0b5a15b95b023317651cd1e09e5b23f31170a761.sol#371-373)
